turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order an espresso macchiato from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry, what do you mean by quad?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Or just give me the largest size.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would also like almond milk on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! not a problem, almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what location would you like to pick that up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get it at the Starbucks or at the University of Houston.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there are 3 different locations, 1st on Calhoun, the next on Leroy and lucile hall and then at Cullen Blvd. which one did you mean?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the one at Calhoun.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! give me one moment to send over your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
